chapters.title: Chapter 7: Out of the Woods
chapters.info: Darl Coplin, p. 82—Man from a farm near Emond's Field. He spent half the night demanding that Bran al'Vere send Moiraine and Lan away. He blamed them for bringing the Trollocs to Emond's Field. See also Coplin, Dag; Coplin, Ewal; Coplin, Hari.
